title: Just swimming
creator_credit: Tom Williamson, New Zealand National Film Unit and John Cooper
brief_description: A motivational film showing the variety of water activities that can be enjoyed once the skills of swimming have been acquired. Features scuba diving, water ballet, water hockey and basketball, competitive swimming, surfing and marathon swimming.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Williamson, New Zealand National Film Unit and John Cooper
